customrecordtype.description: This record is used for cost analysis of potential items. Many of the fields are 'open' so different values can be experimented with. It can also be locked so that a point-in-time can be saved for comparison with 'make copy' versions.

customrecordcustomfield.description: Enter a name for the version of the product name that you wish to capture at this point-in-time.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter a name for the version of the product name that you wish to capture at this point-in-time.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Product Name

customrecordcustomfield.description: From Display Name Field on Item Record.
customrecordcustomfield.help: From Display Name Field on Item Record.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Description

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, this record will be locked from editing to save the values as a point-in-time. It will also not be updated by global "fixit" functions.
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, this record will be locked from editing to save the values as a point-in-time. It will also not be updated by global "fixit" functions.
customrecordcustomfield.label: RECORD LOCK

customrecordcustomfield.description: If the item is classified as a bulk item (bulk item field on item record is checked) then this box is checked for proper souring ad routing logic.
customrecordcustomfield.help: If the item is classified as a bulk item (bulk item field on item record is checked) then this box is checked for proper souring ad routing logic.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bulk Item

customrecordcustomfield.description: Notes on this point in time of this Product.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Notes on this point in time of this Product.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Memo

customrecordcustomfield.description: Link to default cost values to import thresholds and values for item cost specific calcuations.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Link to default cost values to import thresholds and values for item cost specific calcuations.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Item Cost Defaults

customrecordcustomfield.description: Shows if the Contribution Margin calculated is FBM or FBA. Fills in based on if FBA is checked or not.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Shows if the Contribution Margin calculated is FBM or FBA. Fills in based on if FBA is checked or not.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Primary

customrecordcustomfield.description: Actual Margin Costs for Item. Refers to CURRENT categorization of FBM, FBA, or Bulk.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Actual Margin Costs for Item. Refers to CURRENT categorization of FBM, FBA, or Bulk.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Contribution Margin Costs

customrecordcustomfield.description: Margin of profit as calculated by contribution costs per item. Refers to CURRENT categorization of FBM, FBA, or Bulk.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Margin of profit as calculated by contribution costs per item. Refers to CURRENT categorization of FBM, FBA, or Bulk.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Contribution Margin

customrecordcustomfield.description: Percentage of contribution margin as applied to base price (Sales). Refers to CURRENT categorization of FBM, FBA, or Bulk.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Percentage of contribution margin as applied to base price (Sales). Refers to CURRENT categorization of FBM, FBA, or Bulk.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Contribution Margin %

customrecordcustomfield.description: Total Unit Costs for Item. Refers to CURRENT categorization of FBM, FBA, or Bulk. Includes Fixed Overhead.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Total Unit Costs for Item. Refers to CURRENT categorization of FBM, FBA, or Bulk. Includes Fixed Overhead.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Total Unit Costs

customrecordcustomfield.description: Margin of profit as calculated by contribution costs per item. Refers to CURRENT categorization of FBM, FBA, or Bulk. Includes Fixed Overhead.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Margin of profit as calculated by contribution costs per item. Refers to CURRENT categorization of FBM, FBA, or Bulk. Includes Fixed Overhead.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Gross Margin

customrecordcustomfield.description: Percentage of contribution margin as applied to base price (Sales). Refers to CURRENT categorization of FBM, FBA, or Bulk. Includes Fixed Overhead
customrecordcustomfield.help: Percentage of contribution margin as applied to base price (Sales). Refers to CURRENT categorization of FBM, FBA, or Bulk. Includes Fixed Overhead
customrecordcustomfield.label: Gross Margin %

customrecordcustomfield.description: Shows if the Alternate Margin calculated is FBM or FBA. Fills in based on if FBA is checked or not.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Shows if the Alternate Margin calculated is FBM or FBA. Fills in based on if FBA is checked or not.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Alternate

customrecordcustomfield.description: Actual Margin Costs for Item. Refers to OPPOSITE categorization of FBM or FBA for margin comparison.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Actual Margin Costs for Item. Refers to OPPOSITE categorization of FBM or FBA for margin comparison.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Alternate Margin Costs

customrecordcustomfield.description: Margin of profit as calculated by contribution costs per item. Refers to OPPOSITE categorization of FBM or FBA for margin comparison.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Margin of profit as calculated by contribution costs per item. Refers to OPPOSITE categorization of FBM or FBA for margin comparison.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Alternate Margin

customrecordcustomfield.description: Percentage of contribution margin as applied to base price (Sales). Refers to OPPOSITE categorization of FBM or FBA for margin comparison.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Percentage of contribution margin as applied to base price (Sales). Refers to OPPOSITE categorization of FBM or FBA for margin comparison.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Alternate Margin %

customrecordcustomfield.description: Total Unit Costs for Item. Refers to ALTERNATE categorization of FBM, FBA, or Bulk. Includes Fixed Overhead.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Total Unit Costs for Item. Refers to ALTERNATE categorization of FBM, FBA, or Bulk. Includes Fixed Overhead.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Alt Unit Costs

customrecordcustomfield.description: Margin of profit as calculated by contribution costs per item. Refers to ALTERNATE categorization of FBM, FBA, or Bulk. Includes Fixed Overhead.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Margin of profit as calculated by contribution costs per item. Refers to ALTERNATE categorization of FBM, FBA, or Bulk. Includes Fixed Overhead.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Alt Gross Margin

customrecordcustomfield.description: Percentage of contribution margin as applied to base price (Sales). Refers to ALTERNATE categorization of FBM, FBA, or Bulk. Includes Fixed Overhead
customrecordcustomfield.help: Percentage of contribution margin as applied to base price (Sales). Refers to ALTERNATE categorization of FBM, FBA, or Bulk. Includes Fixed Overhead
customrecordcustomfield.label: Alt Gross Margin %

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, the alternate margin is higher than the primary margin. This item should be reviewed to ensure pricing and FBM/FBA decisions are accurate
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, the alternate margin is higher than the primary margin. This item should be reviewed to ensure pricing and FBM/FBA decisions are accurate
customrecordcustomfield.label: Margin Review

customrecordcustomfield.description: Country of Origin for Item
customrecordcustomfield.help: Country of Origin for Item
customrecordcustomfield.label: Country of Origin

customrecordcustomfield.description: Item Shipping weight
customrecordcustomfield.help: Item Shipping weight
customrecordcustomfield.label: Weight

customrecordcustomfield.description: Dimensional Weight calculated as (L*W*H)/our rate number
customrecordcustomfield.help: Dimensional Weight calculated as (L*W*H)/our rate number
customrecordcustomfield.label: Dimensional Weight

customrecordcustomfield.description: Item Shipping Length
customrecordcustomfield.help: Item Shipping Length
customrecordcustomfield.label: Length

customrecordcustomfield.description: Item shipping width
customrecordcustomfield.help: Item shipping width
customrecordcustomfield.label: Width

customrecordcustomfield.description: Item Shipping Height
customrecordcustomfield.help: Item Shipping Height
customrecordcustomfield.label: Height

customrecordcustomfield.description: Calculated Value: Item Length + (2(Item Width) + 2*(Item Height))
customrecordcustomfield.help: Calculated Value: Item Length + (2(Item Width) + 2*(Item Height))
customrecordcustomfield.label: Length + Girth

customrecordcustomfield.description: Import the Maximum units that can ship on a single label from Item Record.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Import the Maximum units that can ship on a single label from Item Record.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Max Qty per Label

customrecordcustomfield.description: Shows the Preferred Vendor for the item.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Shows the Preferred Vendor for the item.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Preferred Vendor

customrecordcustomfield.description: Item category as assigned in Merchandise Hierarchy.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Item category as assigned in Merchandise Heirarchy.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Item Category

customrecordcustomfield.description: Item family as assigned in Merchandise Heirarchy.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Item family as assigned in Merchandise Heirarchy.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Item Family

customrecordcustomfield.description: Shows item's product status (new release, critical, active, etc.)
customrecordcustomfield.help: Shows item's product status (new release, critical, active, etc.)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Product Status

customrecordcustomfield.description: Open field for entering factory name if a preferred/existing vendor is not currently a BirdRock partner.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Open field for entering factory name if a preferred/existing vendor is not currently a BirdRock partner.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Factory

customrecordcustomfield.description: Enter a value for the total units that can be shipped to us in a 40HQ container, that value is reflected here. If the "Container Qty Used for Costing" box is checked, this value is being used to calculate ocean freight charges.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter a value for the total units that can be shipped to us in a 40HQ container, that value is reflected here. If the "Container Qty Used for Costing" box is checked, this value is being used to calculate ocean freight charges.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Manual 40HQ Capacity Qty

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, the max qty that fits in a 40HQ container is used for calculating ocean freight. This is used for nested items that are stacked and unboxed to increase units shipped per container.
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, the max qty that fits in a 40HQ container is used for calculating ocean freight. This is used for nested items that are stacked and unboxed to increase units shipped per container.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Container Qty Used for Costing

customrecordcustomfield.description: Using item dimensions and efficiency percentage, calculates an ESTIMATE of the number of items that can fit in a 40HQ container.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Using item dimensions and efficiency percentage, calculates an ESTIMATE of the number of items that can fit in a 40HQ container.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Estimated Qty/Container by CBM

customrecordcustomfield.description: If Checked, the customer will be paying tariffs, so the value will set to zero for costing. Only applies to Bulk(Drop Ship) Orders.
customrecordcustomfield.help: If Checked, the customer will be paying tariffs, so the value will set to zero for costing. Only applies to Bulk(Drop Ship) Orders.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Customer Pays Tariff

customrecordcustomfield.description: Calculated total tariff cost for this item
customrecordcustomfield.help: Calculated total tariff cost for this item
customrecordcustomfield.label: Total Tariff

customrecordcustomfield.description: Sum of the Tariff, Sourcing, and Sea Freight costs.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Sum of the Tariff, Sourcing, and Sea Freight costs.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Total Landed Cost

customrecordcustomfield.description: Shows the Sea Freight charge by CBM multiplied by the item CBM.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Shows the Sea Freight charge by CBM multiplied by the item CBM.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Total Sea Freight

customrecordcustomfield.description: If Checked, the customer will be paying the Sea Freight, so the value will set to zero for costing. Only applies to Bulk(Drop Ship) Orders.
customrecordcustomfield.help: If Checked, the customer will be paying the Sea Freight, so the value will set to zero for costing. Only applies to Bulk(Drop Ship) Orders.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Customer Pays Sea Freight

customrecordcustomfield.description: Link to Sea Freight custom record for ocean freight charges.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Link to Sea Freight custom record for ocean freight charges.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Sea Freight

customrecordcustomfield.description: Shows aggregated lane cost from country of origin to our warehouses.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Shows aggregated lane cost from country of origin to our warehouses.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Weighted Lane Cost

customrecordcustomfield.description: Calculated as the sum of the Purchase Price and the Total Landing Cost of the item.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Calculated as the sum of the Purchase Price and the Total Landing Cost of the item.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Landed Total

customrecordcustomfield.description: Links to the FBM Transfer Cost record for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Links to the FBM Transfer Cost record for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Transfer Costs

customrecordcustomfield.description: For FBM, sets the percentage of total units that get transferred after initial receipt (as opposed to remaining in the original warehouse)
customrecordcustomfield.help: For FBM, sets the percentage of total units that get transferred after initial receipt (as opposed to remaining in the original warehouse)
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM % of Unit Transfers

customrecordcustomfield.description: Calculated by taking the total transfer costs by origin for FBM Items and multiplying by FBM Percentage of Transfers.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Calculated by taking the total transfer costs by origin for FBM Items and multiplying by FBM Percentage of Transfers.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Weighted Transfer Costs

customrecordcustomfield.description: Links to the FBA Transfer Cost record for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Links to the FBA Transfer Cost record for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Transfer Costs

customrecordcustomfield.description: For FBA, sets the percentage of total units that get transferred after initial receipt (as opposed to remaining in the original warehouse)
customrecordcustomfield.help: For FBA, sets the percentage of total units that get transferred after initial receipt (as opposed to remaining in the original warehouse)
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA % of Unit Transfers

customrecordcustomfield.description: Calculated by taking the total transfer costs by origin for FBA Items and multiplying by FBA Percentage of Transfers.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Calculated by taking the total transfer costs by origin for FBA Items and multiplying by FBA Percentage of Transfers.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Weighted Transfer Costs

customrecordcustomfield.description: Shows the value of either the total FBA or FBM storage cost (depending on the item FBA flag)
customrecordcustomfield.help: Shows the value of either the total FBA or FBM storage cost (depending on the item FBA flag)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Total Storage Cost

customrecordcustomfield.description: Cost for Stored Items in our Warehouses for FBM sales
customrecordcustomfield.help: Cost for Stored Items in our Warehouses for FBM sales
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Storage Cost

customrecordcustomfield.description: The calculated storage cost for 2 months based on the item size tier and the cost per item in cubic inches per Amazon rates (stored on Cost Default Record)
customrecordcustomfield.help: The calculated storage cost for 2 months based on the item size tier and the cost per item in cubic inches per Amazon rates (stored on Cost Default Record)
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Storage Cost

customrecordcustomfield.description: The top-level Amazon Size Tier classification (Standard Size vs. Oversize). This is calculated by shipping rules, but is pulled from item record, because we use that field to determine shipping templates.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The top-level Amazon Size Tier classification (Standard Size vs. Oversize). This is calculated by shipping rules, but is pulled from item record, because we use that field to determine shipping templates.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Amazon Size Tier

customrecordcustomfield.description: The cubic volume in inches of an item for FBA Storage. Calculated as the actuals in (L * W * H) / (12 * 12 * 12) or (L*W*H) / (1728)
customrecordcustomfield.help: The cubic volume in inches of an item for FBA Storage. Calculated as the actuals in (L * W * H) / (12 * 12 * 12) or (L*W*H) / (1728)
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Cubic Feet

customrecordcustomfield.description: Sum of FBA and FBM Fulfillment Fees for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Sum of FBA and FBM Fulfillment Fees for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Total Fulfillment Cost

customrecordcustomfield.description: Sum of FBM Fulfillment(Picking) Fees for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Sum of FBM Fulfillment(Picking) Fees for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Total FBM Fulfillment Fees

customrecordcustomfield.description: Sum of Amazon FBA Fulfillment Fees for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Sum of Amazon FBA Fulfillment Fees for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Total FBA Fulfillment Fees

customrecordcustomfield.description: Calculated with Amazon Default modifier (from default record).
customrecordcustomfield.help: Calculated with Amazon Default modifier (from default record).
customrecordcustomfield.label: Amazon Dimensional Weight

customrecordcustomfield.description: Determined by lookup of item dimensions and matching to Amazon Size Tier Rate Record
customrecordcustomfield.help: Determined by lookup of item dimensions and matching to Amazon Size Tier Rate Record
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Fulfillment Rate Record

customrecordcustomfield.description: Imported from FBA Size Tier Record
customrecordcustomfield.help: Imported from FBA Size Tier Record
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Base Fee

customrecordcustomfield.description: Imported from FBA Size Tier Record & Multiplied by lbs over threshold.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Imported from FBA Size Tier Record & Multiplied by lbs over threshold.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Additional Fees per Pound

customrecordcustomfield.description: Surcharge on all FBA shipments. Imported from Default Values record.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Surcharge on all FBA shipments. Imported from Default Values record.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Fuel Surcharge %

customrecordcustomfield.description: Calculated by multiplying all applicable fees with the current Amazon Fuel Surcharge %
customrecordcustomfield.help: Calculated by multiplying all applicable fees with the current Amazon Fuel Surcharge %
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Fuel Surcharge Amount

customrecordcustomfield.description: Total delivered fees including the Fuel Surcharge Percent Cost
customrecordcustomfield.help: Total delivered fees including the Fuel Surcharge Percent Cost
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Total Delivered Cost

customrecordcustomfield.description: The total FBM Delivered cost for this item before the Fuel Surcharge is applied.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The total FBM Delivered cost for this item.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Total Delivered Fees

customrecordcustomfield.description: Imported base fee for this item's dimensional weight.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Imported base fee for this item's dimensional weight.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Base Fee

customrecordcustomfield.description: Imported residential surcharge fee for this item's actual weight.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Imported residential surcharge fee for this item's actual weight.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Residential Fee

customrecordcustomfield.description: Default percentage fuel surcharge. Improted from Default Costs Record
customrecordcustomfield.help: Default percentage fuel surcharge. Improted from Default Costs Record
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Fuel Surcharge %

customrecordcustomfield.description: Sum of Standard and Residential Peak Surcharges from item costing default record.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Sum of Standard and Residential Peak Surcharges from item costing default record.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Total Peak Surcharge

customrecordcustomfield.description: Imported delivery area surcharge fee for this item's actual weight.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Imported delivery area surcharge fee for this item's actual weight.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Delivery Area Surcharge

customrecordcustomfield.description: Imported remote area delivery surcharge fee for this item's actual weight.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Imported remote area delivery surcharge fee for this item's actual weight.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Remote Delivery Area Surcharge

customrecordcustomfield.description: Imported "other" surcharge fee for this item's actual weight.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Imported "other" surcharge fee for this item's actual weight.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Other Surcharges

customrecordcustomfield.description: Additional Handling Fee, if triggered by any of the additional handling measurements provided.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Additional Handling Fee, if triggered by any of the additional handling measurements provided.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Additional Handling Fee

customrecordcustomfield.description: Large Package Fee, if triggered by any of the additional handling measurements provided.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Large Package Fee, if triggered by any of the additional handling measurements provided.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Large Package Fee

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Weight is over the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Weight is over the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Additional Handling: Weight

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Length + Girth is over the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Length + Girth is over the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Additional Handling: Length + Girth

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Length is over the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Length is over the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Additional Handling: Length

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Width is over the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Width is over the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Additional Handling: Width

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, the number of units under one label is greater than 1, and assumed to be a banded/strapped item which triggers the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, the number of units under one label is greater than 1, and assumed to be a banded/strapped item which triggers the Additional Handling Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Additional Handling: Packaging

customrecordcustomfield.description: If the Additional Handling Fee applies, this is added.
customrecordcustomfield.help: If the Additional Handling Fee applies, this is added.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Peak Surcharge Fee: Add'l Handling

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Length + Girth is over the Residential Large Package Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Length + Girth is over the Residential Large Package Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Large Package: Residential Length + Girth

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Length is over the Residential Large Package Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Length is over the Residential Large Package Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Large Package: Residential Length

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Length + Girth is over the Commercial Large Package Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Length + Girth is over the Commercial Large Package Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Large Package: Commercial Length + Girth

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Length is over the Commercial Large Package Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Length is over the Commercial Large Package Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Large Package: Commercial Length

customrecordcustomfield.description: If the Large Package Fee applies, this is added.
customrecordcustomfield.help: If the Large Package Fee applies, this is added.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Peak Surcharge : Large Package

customrecordcustomfield.description: Over Maximum Limit Fee, if triggered by any of the over maximum measurements provided.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Over Maximum Limit Fee, if triggered by any of the over maximum measurements provided.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Over Max Limit Fee

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Weight is over the Over Maximum Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Weight is over the Over Maximum Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Over Maximum: Weight

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Length + Girth is over the Over Maximum Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Length + Girth is over the Over Maximum Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Over Maximum: Length/Girth

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, item Length is over the Over Maximum Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, item Length is over the Over Maximum Threshold
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Over Maximum: Length

customrecordcustomfield.description: Placeholder for FBM Picking Cost
customrecordcustomfield.help: Placeholder for FBM Picking Cost
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Picking Cost

customrecordcustomfield.description: Calculated by multiplying all applicable fees with the current UPS Fuel Surcharge %
customrecordcustomfield.help: Calculated by multiplying all applicable fees with the current UPS Fuel Surcharge %
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Fuel Surcharge Amount

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, the base fee shown is the Amazon peak (holiday) fee rate. The peak fee trigger is activated on the costing default record.
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, the base fee shown is the Amazon peak (holiday) fee rate. The peak fee trigger is activated on the costing default record.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Peak Surcharge Active

customrecordcustomfield.description: Link to applicable sold cost record for this item sales type (FBM/Retail, FBA, Bulk, etc.)
customrecordcustomfield.help: Link to applicable sold cost record for this item sales type (FBM/Retail, FBA, Bulk, etc.)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Sold Costs Record

customrecordcustomfield.description: FBM amount of sales commission from percentage fees (from custom record)
customrecordcustomfield.help: FBM amount of sales commission from percentage fees (from custom record)
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Commission % Amount

customrecordcustomfield.description: FBM item Per Unit sales commission fees
customrecordcustomfield.help: FBM item Per Unit sales commission fees
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Sales Commission per Unit Fees

customrecordcustomfield.description: Total sold cost for FBM (commissions, processing, return allowance).
customrecordcustomfield.help: Total sold cost for FBM (commissions, processing, return allowance).
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Total Sold Costs

customrecordcustomfield.description: FBA amount of sales commission from percentage fees (from custom record)
customrecordcustomfield.help: FBA amount of sales commission from percentage fees (from custom record)
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Commission % Amount

customrecordcustomfield.description: FBA Per Unit item sales commission fees
customrecordcustomfield.help: FBA Per Unit item sales commission fees
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Sales Commission per Unit Fees

customrecordcustomfield.description: Total sold cost for FBA (commissions, processing, return allowance).
customrecordcustomfield.help: Total sold cost for FBA (commissions, processing, return allowance).
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Total Sold Costs

customrecordcustomfield.description: Bulk item amount of sales commission from percentage fees (from custom record)
customrecordcustomfield.help: Bulk item amount of sales commission from percentage fees (from custom record)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bulk Commission % Amount

customrecordcustomfield.description: Bulk Item Per Unit sales commission fees
customrecordcustomfield.help: Bulk Item Per Unit sales commission fees
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bulk Sales Commission per Unit Fees

customrecordcustomfield.description: Total sold cost for Bulk Items (commissions, processing, return allowance).
customrecordcustomfield.help: Total sold cost for Bulk Items (commissions, processing, return allowance).
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bulk Item Total Sold Costs

customrecordcustomfield.description: Shows the calculated amount from expected refunds, return shipments, and restocks for FBM Items
customrecordcustomfield.help: Shows the calculated amount from expected refunds, return shipments, and restocks for FBM Items
customrecordcustomfield.label: Total Refund/Return FBM

customrecordcustomfield.description: Shows the calculated amount from expected refunds, return shipments, and restocks for FBA Items
customrecordcustomfield.help: Shows the calculated amount from expected refunds, return shipments, and restocks for FBA Items
customrecordcustomfield.label: Total Refund/Return FBA

customrecordcustomfield.description: The lessor of the calculated admin fee from Amazon or the max admin fee cap value.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The lessor of the calculated admin fee from Amazon or the max admin fee cap value.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Refund Admin Fee

customrecordcustomfield.description: The refund rate * return rate as applied to Net Landed Cost
customrecordcustomfield.help: The refund rate * return rate as applied to Net Landed Cost
customrecordcustomfield.label: Inventory Loss

customrecordcustomfield.description: Refund Rate * FBM Picking Fee
customrecordcustomfield.help: Refund Rate * FBM Picking Fee
customrecordcustomfield.label: Pick Loss: FBM

customrecordcustomfield.description: Refund Rate * FBA Fulfillment Fee
customrecordcustomfield.help: Refund Rate * FBA Fulfillment Fee
customrecordcustomfield.label: Fulfillment Loss: FBA

customrecordcustomfield.description: Refund rate * FBM shipping label cost
customrecordcustomfield.help: Refund rate * FBM shipping label cost
customrecordcustomfield.label: Label Loss: FBM

customrecordcustomfield.description: Refund Rate * Return Rate applied to fbm shipping cost
customrecordcustomfield.help: Refund Rate * Return Rate applied to fbm shipping cost
customrecordcustomfield.label: Return Shipping Cost

customrecordcustomfield.description: A net positive amount for inventory that we can resell. Refund rate * Return rate * Restock rate applied to net landed cost total
customrecordcustomfield.help: A net positive amount for inventory that we can resell. Refund rate * Return rate * Restock rate applied to net landed cost total
customrecordcustomfield.label: Inventory Cost Recovery

customrecordcustomfield.description: Shows the calculated amount from expected refunds, return shipments, and restocks for bulk Items
customrecordcustomfield.help: Shows the calculated amount from expected refunds, return shipments, and restocks for bulk Items
customrecordcustomfield.label: Total Refund/Return Bulk

customrecordcustomfield.description: This is the 20% of what's returned we can't sell. Refund Rate * Return Rate * (1 - Restock Rate) applied to Net Landed Cost
customrecordcustomfield.help: This is the 20% of what's returned we can't sell. Refund Rate * Return Rate * (1 - Restock Rate) applied to Net Landed Cost
customrecordcustomfield.label: Unrecoverable Inventory

customrecordcustomfield.description: First Cost (purchase price) multiplied by default Fixed Overhead Percentage as default-assigned.
customrecordcustomfield.help: First Cost (purchase price) multiplied by default Fixed Overhead Percentage as default-assigned.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Fixed Overhead Amount
